#SocialJournalism or #SoJo has an objective, to erase the idiom ”If you don’t read the newspaper you are uninformed, If you read the newspaper then you are misinformed.”http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/YH9XxrpeUb

We Indians are notorious for not recording our history meticulously as most others do. This is no longer a short coming because now we have Google Chacha to turn to anytime we need to check on any information from the times gone by.http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/CsULDUrtbd

We progressed from Print to Audio to Audio visual, with technology newer innovation were offered we kept experimenting with each, Blogs, then Micro blogging sites .http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/WWjT2GLcr8
and now we are in the era of Digital Media, where we are employing, Print, Audio & audio visual techniques.http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/JByscPGEK7

The most challenging task before us is to restore the credibility of Media, infuse positive outlook , present news in a positive format. Media cannot be about gloom and doom all the while,http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/uK1wVMv0gn

it cannot present news as silver lining to dark  clouds.By no stretch of imagination #SocialJournalism does not translate into, not having any political preferences or subscribing/supporting any ideology, http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/SJ493h32OY

#SocialJournalism entail not looking at all events and incidents through one particular coloured lens and leaning to one side,which results in presenting news in a specific single colour and skewed perspective. http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/um7t6XyYvL
We must not allow our political preferences and ideological mooring to be visible in our reportage.http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/rGZ2viJBKH

We will have to respose faith in the consumer and their ability to comprehend, decipher information and reach their own conclusions..http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/tDUGGXYnWW

#SocialJournalism is not about profits, its not about agenda, political loyalties and narratives #SoJo is here to stay its by the passionate, for the passionate of the passionate.http://newsnviews.online/news-n-views/hip-hip-hurray-sojo/ …pic.twitter.com/VfbTO86EtT
